Think It. Speak It. Create It.

Mac users expect only the best from the applications they use on their Macs. Dragon Dictate for Mac was built from the ground up to ensure the ultimate experience on Mac OS X. Dragon Dictate provides astounding accuracy and productivity. 
You simply talk and leave the recognition to Dragon Dictate. 

Additional speech recognition solutions for the Mac include a medical edition that supports over 54 medical and dental specialties, and a legal edition that includes a special language model to help you achieve optimal out-of-the-box accuracy when dictating legal terms. An international edition supports English, French, German, and Italian.

Dragon Dictate

Dragon Dictate provides a whole new way to interact with your Mac. Instead of typing, use your voice to input text; rather than clicking your mouse, just speak commands. With Dragon Dictate, it's easy.

* Stop typing and start talking

* Focus on content, not typing

* Talk to your computer, and it obeys you

* Built for the Mac

* Turn talk into text

Instead of a keyboard, use your voice to produce text.
